com.hazelcast.internal.memory

Class GlobalMemoryAccessorRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hazelcast.internal.memory.GlobalMemoryAccessorRegistry

  • public final class GlobalMemoryAccessorRegistry
extends Object
    Provides GlobalMemoryAccessor implementations by their GlobalMemoryAccessorType.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static GlobalMemoryAccessor AMEM
      Like MEM, but an instance specialized for aligned memory access.
      static boolean AMEM_AVAILABLE
      If this constant is true, then AMEM refers to a usable MemoryAccessor instance.
      static GlobalMemoryAccessor MEM
      A GlobalMemoryAccessor that allows both aligned and unaligned native memory access.
      static boolean MEM_AVAILABLE
      If this constant is true, then MEM refers to a usable MemoryAccessor instance.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static GlobalMemoryAccessor getDefaultGlobalMemoryAccessor()
      Returns the default GlobalMemoryAccessor instance.
      static GlobalMemoryAccessor getGlobalMemoryAccessor(GlobalMemoryAccessorType type)
      Returns the MemoryAccessor instance appropriate to the given GlobalMemoryAccessorType.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • MEM

        public static final GlobalMemoryAccessor MEM
        A GlobalMemoryAccessor that allows both aligned and unaligned native memory access.

      • MEM_AVAILABLE

        public static final boolean MEM_AVAILABLE
        If this constant is true, then MEM refers to a usable MemoryAccessor instance.

      • AMEM

        public static final GlobalMemoryAccessor AMEM
        Like MEM, but an instance specialized for aligned memory access. Requesting unaligned memory access from this instance will result in low-level JVM crash on platforms which do not support it.

      • AMEM_AVAILABLE

        public static final boolean AMEM_AVAILABLE
        If this constant is true, then AMEM refers to a usable MemoryAccessor instance.

    • Method Detail

      • getGlobalMemoryAccessor

        public static GlobalMemoryAccessor getGlobalMemoryAccessor(GlobalMemoryAccessorType type)
        Returns the MemoryAccessor instance appropriate to the given GlobalMemoryAccessorType.

      • getDefaultGlobalMemoryAccessor

        public static GlobalMemoryAccessor getDefaultGlobalMemoryAccessor()
        Returns the default GlobalMemoryAccessor instance.
